app_descript:
Dropbox

Brief: Dropbox is a cloud storage service that provides users with tools to organize, secure, and manage their files effortlessly. With innovative features like Automated Folders and a new Tagging System, Dropbox enhances the efficiency of handling digital files, especially for team users.

Operating Guide:

  • To upload a video, ensure you have sufficient space in your Dropbox account. Patience is needed during this step due to the process and server load.
  • For online watching, simply log in to your Dropbox from any computer to view the videos you've uploaded and access your stored file list.
